definitions.definition: A purplish mark on the skin due to leakage of blood from capillaries under the surface that have been damaged by a blow .
A dark mark on fruit or vegetables caused by a blow to the surface.

main_definition: A purplish mark on the skin due to leakage of blood from capillaries under the surface that have been damaged by a blow .
secondary_definitions: A dark mark on fruit or vegetables caused by a blow to the surface.
